title: Paying an invoice
description: Select how you wish to pay then proceed with broadcasting the payment(s).

recipientAccount.info: This is the account which you're being asked to pay in this invoice.

recipientName.info: This is an arbitrary plaintext name for the invoice creator to indicate who is being paid. It is not necessarily a BitShares account name.

identifier.info: This identifier will be used as the memo/message when the invoice is paid.

timeSince.info: This is when the invoice was created.

note.info: This is an optional note provided by the invoice creator.

tooltips.selectPayment: Select your payment method from the dropdown selector

totals.title: Total invoice payments
totals.description: How much you're spending compared to your available balances.

tooltips.amountRequested: This is the amount of {{asset}} being requested.
tooltips.currentBalance: This is your current balance of {{asset}}.
tooltips.needMore: You must acquire {{required}} more {{asset}} to proceed with successful invoice payment!

invalid.title: Invalid Invoice
invalid.description: The provided invoice code is invalid. Please check the code and try again.

initial.title: Paying an invoice
initial.description: After providing a valid invoice code, your invoice details will appear!
